message.content: {"id": "10022", "title": "Bug 10022 - Incorrect \"Build\" popup action enablement", "description": "The \"Build\" popup action is incorrectly enabled in all cases in the Java perspective.", "OB": "No OB statement provided.", "EB": "If the build is already done, the \"Build\" action should not be manually triggered; it should be automatically handled.Mazen Faraj.", "SR": "The \"Build\" action in the context-sensitive popup menu in the Java perspective should only be enabled when there are changes or updates that require building."}
